title: Sustainability - Kettering University
summary: Sustainability encompasses multiple efforts to preserve, reuse, and create new resources without depleting them for future generations. Sustainability engineering helps us develop new products and processes that meet our current needs while considering future resource availability. Sustainability engineers prioritize smart and regenerative use of resources, ensuring that we have enough resources for future development.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article highlights the importance of innovation in achieving sustainability goals, particularly through sustainable engineering.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article does not provide specific examples of business innovations.

green_process: FALSE. The article does not provide specific examples of green processes.
greenwashing: The article does not provide any examples of greenwashing, so it is not possible to determine whether the described innovation is an example of greenwashing.

title: Moen® Smart Sprinkler Controller Makes Outdoor Watering Routines Effortless, All From The Palm of Your Hand - PR Newswire
summary: Moen has launched a Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors to provide users with an intelligent and affordable way to control their home's irrigation system and reduce water waste. The Smart Sprinkler Controller can reduce an average home's irrigation water use by up to 30 percent, saving the home up to 15,000 gallons of water annually compared to a clock-based controller. The Smart Wireless Soil Sensors monitor precise data on zone moisture levels and communicate with the Smart Sprinkler Controller to automatically adjust watering schedules when needed.
green_innovation: TRUE. The Moen Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors are green innovations because they contribute to environmental sustainability goals by reducing water consumption.
business_innovation: TRUE. The Moen Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors are business innovations because they are new or improved products that differ significantly from the firm's previous products and have been introduced on the market.
green_product: TRUE. The Moen Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors are green products because they are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not describe a process that meets the criteria to be a green process.
product_or_process: Moen Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors

title: Brands turn to traditional Chinese culture to attract young customers - China Daily
summary: Beijing Daoxiangcun is a time-honored snack brand that is launching new products to attract young customers. The company is creating new products with trendy contents, such as a rabbit cake with soybean cheese carrot fillings, and renovating stores to offer a variety of authentic Beijing pastries with new twists.

title: TOTO Roars Back to Las Vegas for KBIS 2023 with Innovative New Residential and Commercial Products and a New ... - PR Newswire
summary: TOTO, the world's largest manufacturer of bathroom fixtures and fittings, showcased their latest innovations featuring advanced technology and sustainable designs at the Kitchen and Bath Industry Show 2023 (KBIS). Their new NEOREST Smart Bidet Toilets, GB Shower Series Rain Showers, and Body Spray offer unparalleled comfort and hygiene while conserving water. TOTO's commercial toilet with the TORNADO FLUSH system provides exceptional performance and water efficiency, making it an ideal choice for commercial settings. These innovations demonstrate TOTO's commitment to enhancing the bathroom experience while prioritizing sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE, TOTO's NEOREST Smart Bidet Toilets incorporate advanced cleaning technologies such as EWATER+ to reduce the need for harsh chemicals, promoting a healthier environment.
business_innovation: TRUE, TOTO's new products, including the NEOREST Smart Bidet Toilets, GB Shower Series, and commercial toilet, offer innovative designs and technologies that enhance the bathroom experience for both residential and commercial settings.
green_product: TRUE, TOTO's GB Shower Series Rain Showers utilize COMFORT WAVE® water technology to create a more comfortable and water-efficient showering experience, reducing water consumption while maintaining a luxurious feel.
green_process: TRUE, TOTO's commercial toilet features the TORNADO FLUSH system, which effectively removes waste with minimal water usage, conserving water and reducing the environmental impact of commercial restrooms.
product_or_process: NEOREST Smart Bidet Toilets, GB Shower Series, commercial toilet
